title: Filling Treatment
description: Restore decayed or damaged teeth with precision and long-lasting materials. Suitable for both children and adults.

title: Scaling & Polishing
description: Remove plaque, tartar, and stains to maintain healthy gums and teeth, preventing gum disease.

title: Root Canal Treatment
description: Save infected teeth by removing pulp and sealing them, relieving pain while preserving natural teeth.

title: Dental Tourism / New Tooth Replacement
description: Get new teeth replacements or full dental rehabilitation with high-quality care and modern techniques.

title: Tooth Extraction
description: Safe removal of damaged or problematic teeth to prevent further oral issues, with pain-managed procedures.

title: Fiber Bridge Treatment
description: Replace missing teeth with strong, natural-looking fiber bridges for functional and aesthetic restoration.

title: Orthodontics (Teeth Straightening)
description: Correct misaligned teeth and bite issues using braces or clear aligners, enhancing appearance and oral health.

title: Smile Design
description: Enhance your smile by reshaping teeth, adjusting alignment, and improving aesthetics with customized plans.

title: Tooth Whitening
description: Safe whitening procedures to brighten your teeth, giving a radiant and confident smile.

title: Black Gum Treatment
description: Restore healthy gum color and reduce pigmentation for improved aesthetics and oral health.

title: Tooth Shaping (Contouring)
description: Correct uneven teeth edges and reshape for a uniform and beautiful smile.

title: U-Veneers
description: Thin custom shells covering imperfections to create a perfect, natural-looking teeth appearance.

title: Partial Denture Teeth
description: Removable dental prosthesis to replace missing teeth while preserving surrounding natural teeth.

title: Dental Crowns & Bridges
description: High-quality crowns and bridges restore damaged or missing teeth, improving function and aesthetics.

title: Dental Implant
description: Permanent replacement for missing teeth using titanium implants, restoring chewing function and appearance.

title: Fiber Post
description: Supports weak or root-treated teeth by reinforcing them with a durable fiber post.

title: Zirconium Cap / Bridge
description: Durable and aesthetic zirconium crowns or bridges providing long-lasting tooth restoration.
